config.ClothingStyle.name: Clothing Style
config.ClothingStyle.description: The clothing style (masculine or feminine) to get from tailoring. "Default" uses your farmer's in-game gender/body type. "Random" will randomly give you the M or F version each time you craft.
config.MakeoverOutfitStyle.name: Makeover Outfit Style
config.MakeoverOutfitStyle.description: The outfit style you will get from the Desert Festival makeover. "Default" uses your farmer's in-game gender/body type. "Any" means you can get masculine, feminine, or neutral outfits. "Neutral only" will only give you outfits that the game marks as neither feminine nor masculine.
